body:
Hi Islam,


You have not really provided enough information to even offer suggestions as to possible causes.  The Radiance file you attached doesn't even contain your BSDF material.  It is a single-material object made of a smokey dielectric.


At the very least, you should include the error that you got and the context in which you got it.  Otherwise, no one can help you.


Best,
-Greg
___
